casebody.data:
Alston Gerry, et al., Appellants v. Louis Cattaberry, et al., Respondents. Decided May 4, 1891. Appeal by plaintiff from an order denying motion to continue injunction. L. Laflin Kellogg, for appellants. Arthur C. Butts, for respondents.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J., and McAdam, J.

Per Curiam.

Order affirmed, with ten dollars costs to abide event.
